content: अपथ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [नास्ति पंथा यत्र] Pathless, roadless; °थो देशः, °था नगरी &c. --थं , --थः (also अपंथाः <ls>P. V. 4. 72</ls>, II. {4} <ls n="P.">II. 4. 30</ls>) {@--1@} Not a way, absence of a way or road, pathless state; a bad or wrong road (<ab>lit.</ab>); (<ab>fig.</ab>) irregularity, deviation, a moral irregularity or deviation, a wrong road, bad or evil course; अपथे पदमर्पयंति हि श्रुतवंतोपि रजोनिमीलिताः <ls>R. 9. 74</ls>; <ls n="R.">17. 54</ls>; न कश्चिद्वर्णानामपथमपकृष्टोपि भजते <ls>Ś. 5. 10</ls> follows evil ways; कारितस्त्वमपथे पद मया <ls>Ki. 13. 45</ls>, <ls n="Ki. 13.">64.</ls> {@--2@} Heresy, heterodoxy (in opinions). {@--3@} The vulva. --था <ab>N.</ab> of several plants. --थं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} By or in the wrong way, astray; अपथं वर्तते <ls>Sk.</ls>
